title: StarshipDoge
author: StarshipDoge
content: Hello, I am the founder of the HALLOWEEN X project. We aim to kill 5 zeros after our listing on CoinMarketCap. We had to pay for the accelerated procedure in order to be listed!CA : 0x6f61b008d356Aef11Ee70e09d20d603ECAef0292TELEGRAM: https://t.me/hallowenglobalgroup

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: What's the point of this and why is it needed.  Are you just trying to make money off of a holiday that's coming up?  For one why don't you add some details and second this is probably the wrong section to post this in.  Probably needs to be in announcements.

comments.author: dravenbtc
comments.body: Quote from: wheelz1200 on October 27, 2023, 09:13:18 PMWhat's the point of this and why is it needed.  Are you just trying to make money off of a holiday that's coming up?  For one why don't you add some details and second this is probably the wrong section to post this in.  Probably needs to be in announcements.You are correct, should be like a shill content and we don't need it, as we can read on start TG: Halloween X is a community driven meme token. Don't miss the Halloween hype that comes around once a year which will be celebrated all over the world.Actual 7.5k $ Liguidity.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: What's next after the halloween has ended? I highly doubt that you'll be able to achieve that goal you're saying of killing 5 zeroes. Don't let the people do that for you if you're up to this project, it's another meme coin that you probably have developed and will eventually die once the date of the halloween ended. People should just stop making new tokens and don't do it as a habit.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on October 30, 2023, 06:56:07 PMWhat's next after the halloween has ended? I highly doubt that you'll be able to achieve that goal you're saying of killing 5 zeroes. Don't let the people do that for you if you're up to this project, it's another meme coin that you probably have developed and will eventually die once the date of the halloween ended. People should just stop making new tokens and don't do it as a habit.Arent these type of people do knows on what they are saying or trying out to achieve? Arent that they are just that too dumb on just posting up that "Hey, put your money or invest your hard earned funds into my meme coin".    Do he really believe that he would be getting any investments on people on just telling with that shit line and telling about killing 5 zeroes? He didnt even bothered on telling on whats the use case of this project and come in mind that he had been talking about having no funds on getting listed on which does simply imply on how shit this project is.@OP, dont expect that you would really be getting even $1 on just simply posting up CA and your TG group. People on this forumarent that dumb enough for us to believe with those words and blindly just investing into your 1-minute creation kind of meme project. LOOOOOL!

However, it's not costing them that much in generating this one and they just have to try it again until some investors will be fooled and believes them.Anyway, I am not one of them.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on October 30, 2023, 06:56:07 PMWhat's next after the halloween has ended? I highly doubt that you'll be able to achieve that goal you're saying of killing 5 zeroes. Don't let the people do that for you if you're up to this project, it's another meme coin that you probably have developed and will eventually die once the date of the halloween ended. People should just stop making new tokens and don't do it as a habit.Yeah, but no one can make them stop, because everyone's right to do make new tokens with eth or bnb is an essential part of the ethos. In fact more scams and useless tokens there will be, it just speaks about the freedom you get with cryptocurrencies. I would be more worried if there would be less of them.Think anything you want from millions of scam and meme tokens, they still are feature and a proof of working platform, not an undesirable quality.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: At times like these, it is best to avoid any token bearing the name Halloween. The season is now holidays and some people, and the Halloween punch is a trend, so scammers create a token and pump the price. You will find that it is an excellent opportunity to make some quick profit, but you will be the one who is being scammed.We have some tokens in similar seasons and they were all scams, such as the Squid game, which coincided with the end of the series.How a Squid Game Crypto Scam Got Away With Millions Don't trust the green candles they promise you.

comments.author: Supianto
comments.body: That's pointless and dangerous to make a memecoin related to a certain date. It's hard to get attention because there are tons of other memecoins. And no one will even try to care about yours from this day 'till the next Halloween.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on November 01, 2023, 12:35:05 AMQuote from: livingfree on October 30, 2023, 06:56:07 PMWhat's next after the halloween has ended? I highly doubt that you'll be able to achieve that goal you're saying of killing 5 zeroes. People should just stop making new tokens and don't do it as a habit.Yeah, but no one can make them stop, because everyone's right to do make new tokens with eth or bnb is an essential part of the ethos. In fact more scams and useless tokens there will be, it just speaks about the freedom you get with cryptocurrencies. I would be more worried if there would be less of them.Think anything you want from millions of scam and meme tokens, they still are feature and a proof of working platform, not an undesirable quality.I hope for the betterment and hopefully they'll just stop out of nowhere and they think that they have to. That's true this is decentralization and everyone is free to make such projects and even the most nonsense and useless ones. That's why we can see them keep coming no mater what happens.Whether we're in a bull or bear run, everything comes naturally to this market with such types of projects as this. A few hours from now, the name of the project will be remembered after a year again.
